alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:17PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GILA AND NAVAJO COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM MST... At 317 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Carrizo to 8 miles south of Young to near Star Valley. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Star Valley, Jakes Corner, Gisela, Rye, Deer Creek, Cibecue, Rose Creek Campground, and Reynolds Creek Group Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 288 between mile markers 273 and 299. State Route 260 between mile markers 255 and 259. State Route 188 between mile markers 267 and 276. State Route 87 southbound mile marker 241 and near mile marker 246. State Route 87 between mile markers 230 and 246. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
